name: Missing: Eden (WIP Demo)
description:
You play as the character Eden. You are looking for information about your memories and family, which brings you to a planet where there a Fortune Teller claims to have said information. However, the planet is currently holding a festival for the crowning on their new king. With all the crowds, it might be hard to get to where you are going.  Not to mention not everyone is there for a happy celebration

In 2018 we had to create this demo in less than two months for Heartland 2018. This was what we managed to get done, and we were able to place in 1st.

We are currently reviving and going over what we have completed, along with working on finishing the rest of the game, and hope to have something much more polished done for another game convention contest November 2018.

We have a much grander scheme but are hoping to gain attention and support by starting with a  more humble version so that we can tackle our bigger project.
